metadata.name: Pepe With Balloon
metadata.description:

@balajis:  "I will take that bet. You buy 1 BTC. I will send $1M USD This is ~40:1 odds as 1 BTC is worth ~$26k. The term is 90 days... #BitSignal"  

THIS IS ART (of social commentary)!  
  
Inspired by 'Girl With Balloon' by Banksy.  
This is part of the "Pepe Sees Everything" collection by @NiftyStroke. He creates art with Pepe as a commentary on society and current affairs.
